      • capitalize

        public static java.lang.String capitalize(java.lang.String s)
        Parameters:
        s - any string
        Returns:
        the input string s with the first character capitalized, and the rest lower case

      • formatWithHTML

        public static java.lang.String formatWithHTML(java.lang.String message,
                                              java.lang.String align)
        Parameters:
        message - any string
        align - a string "left", "right", or "center" that determines the alignment of the HTML text
        Returns:
        text formatted with HTML which can be used in a Swing application

      • numberPlusMinusRandom

        public static int numberPlusMinusRandom(int num,
                                        int range)
        Returns a number plus a random range
        Parameters:
        num - any number
        range - a range which the number is allowed to fluctuate above and below.
        Returns:
        the number num added to a number which is randomly selected and is in the range (-range <= x <= range)

      • numberRandomMinMax

        public static int numberRandomMinMax(int min,
                                     int max)
        Returns a random number in a range
        Parameters:
        min - minimum that the number can be
        max - maximum that the number can be
        Returns:
        a random number in the range (min <= x <= max)
